statusbar.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Set the task to display in the statusbar.

hide.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Set it as "hide"to hide the task on statusbar.

label.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Set the label of the statusbar.
You can embed icons in the text by leveraging the syntax: $(icon-name)
https://octicons.github.com

tooltip.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Set the tooltip of the statusbar.

color.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Set the foreground color of the statusbar.
https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/theme-color

filePattern.default: file pattern of applicable files for statusbar
filePattern.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Set the active editor file pattern for which the statusbar is displayed.
Leave blank to have always displayed.

position.description:
Provided by extension:tasks.
Use this to manually set the order of tasks in the statusbar.
